summary: 23 short stories about the Mari women. Stories joyful and sad, ridiculous and terrible. It is the movie ornament, the movie calendar telling about philosophy, traditions and today of the Mari people.
cast: Yuliya Aug|Yana Esipovich|Vasiliy Domrachyov|Darya Ekamasova|Olga Dobrina|Yana Troyanova|Olga Degtyaryova|Aleksandr Ivashkevich|Yana Sekste|Polina Aug
title: Nebesnye zheny lugovykh mari
